features: With Simply Gentle Glide you can have the best of both worlds – it’s simple and a great value! Have peace of mind with the perfect fit for your unique flow. Packaging May Vary
360° Protection - Shapes to your body for a protective barrier against leaks.
Purified Fibers - Washed up to 5 times and weaved together to form an absorbent core.
Comfort Shape Plastic Applicator - Comfort shape applicator free from colors, dyes and BPA.
Available in 18 and 36 counts; scented or unscented
body.description: Product Description Playtex Simply Gentle Glide Tampons. Simple. Gentle. Reliable. Every ingredient used in Playtex Simply Gentle Glide is rigorously evaluated to provide reliable protection that you can trust to be gentle and safe for your body.* With purified fibers washed up to five times** and a comfort shape applicator that’s free from colors, dyes and BPA, you can feel good about choosing Simply Gentle Glide! *When used as instructed. **Purified fibers washed up to 5 times and weaved together to form an absorbent core Brand Story By Playtex From the Manufacturer Unique 360-degree design conforms to your shape. View larger.360° TRIPLE PROTECTION Our 360 Protection tampon has been designed with three layers, and shapes to your body for a fabulous fit. 3-layer design for a protective barrier against leaks Comfort shape plastic applicator for sure fit placement. DuraClean wrapper is purse resistant for protection on the go. Great Fit, Great Protection.What's in the Box Playtex Gentle Glide 360° Tampons, Unscented, Super (36 count).Playtex Gentle Glide 360° Unscented TamponsRegular 40 ct.Super 36 ct.Super Plus 36 ct.Ultra 36 ct.Multipack 36 ct.Multipack Super/Super Plus 36 ct.Multipack Slender 50 ct.Playtex Personal Cleansing ClothsTub DispenserSinglesRefill PackTravel PackTampons are associated with Toxic Shock Syndrome (TSS). TSS is a rare but serious disease that may cause death. Please consult the product insert for further information. WARNING SIGNS OF TSS ARE, FOR EXAMPLE, SUDDEN FEVER (USUALLY 102° F OR MORE), VOMITING, DIARRHEA, FAINTING OR NEAR FAINTING WHEN STANDING UP, DIZZINESS, OR A RASH THAT LOOKS LIKE A SUNBURN. IF THESE SIGNS OR OTHER SIGNS OF TSS APPEAR, YOU SHOULD REMOVE THE TAMPON AT ONCE, DISCONTINUE USE, AND SEE YOUR DOCTOR IMMEDIATELY. IMPORTANT FACTS ABOUT TSS:There is risk of TSS to all women using tampons during their menstrual period. TSS is a rare but serious disease that may cause death. There are scientific studies that have concluded that tampons contribute to the cause of TSS. The reported risks are higher to women under 30 years of age and teenage girls. The incidence of TSS is estimated to be between 1 and 17 cases of TSS per 100,000 menstruating women and girls per year. REDUCING YOUR RISK OF TSS:You can reduce the risk of developing TSS during your period by alternating tampons with feminine pads. You can avoid any possible risk of getting tampon-associated TSS by not using tampons. There are scientific studies which have concluded that higher absorbency tampons increase the risk of TSS. You should select the minimum absorbency needed to control your flow to reduce the risk of developing TSS. Tampons are available in a range of absorbencies: Regular Absorbency (6-9 grams), Super Absorbency (9-12 grams) and Super Plus Absorbency (12-15 grams). Each absorbency range represents the grams of fluid that can be absorbed by all manufacturers' tampons based on a standardized laboratory test. Use this information to compare the absorbency of these tampons to other brands. If you have had warning signs of TSS in the past, you should check with your doctor before using tampons again. Consult your doctor if you have any questions about tampon use and TSS. See more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy them if you have very heavy periods
reviews.reviewText: My periods are very heavy and nothing works but the Playtex ultra. They are super absorbent. And I can actually go out and not have to worry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comparing Playtex 360 Ultra to Tampax Pearl Ultra.
reviews.reviewText: I have menorrhagia and need Ultra tampons but I couldn't find a review anywhere comparing the specifics of the two Ultra tampons (w/applicators, I don't mess with O.B.) so I decided I would write one.I've been using Tampax Pearl Ultra and bought a box of these for comparison- so here's what I think:The applicator with these comes apart really easily- the plunger just falls out unless you keep your finger on the bottom of it, which is sort of hard for me to do because the applicator is long and I have small hands. --Now that I've been using these for a while, it's gotten easier but the plunger still sucks-- Conversely, the Tampax applicator plunger cannot fall out from the rest of the applicator.The Gentle Glide grip area is similar to the grip on the Tampax Radiant and is better than the grip area on the Tampax Pearl.I do like Playtex's slimmer applicator compared to thick one used by Tampax.The Playtex wrapper is apparently not made to be used to dispose of the application like Tampax wrappers are and is made of thinner material that (from past experience) tends to tear open when they are put in purses/backpacks.I really like that the Playtex tampon expands in all directions (hence the 360 name I guess).Tampax Pearl only expands on two sides.I haven't had any leaks with these after using them for nearly a full month. I have had leaks with Pearl Ultra, but I've using them for quite a while so that really isn't a fair comparison. With the Pearl I almost always wore a pad because of the leaks, I've been able to stop doing that.I think the lack of leaks is because the 360 design handles clots (a significant problem for me) much better.If they would just change the plunger on these so it doesn't fall out of the applicator, I would give these 5 stars.What I want is the Playtex Gentle Glide 360 tampon in the Tampax Radiant (not Pearl) applicator and wrapper but that's not going to happen.I've decided to change brands to the Playtex Gentle Glide 360 because a having superior tampon far outweighs having a somewhat flawed applicator and cheap wrappers.I really wish there were more Ultra tampon options available.I'm grateful Amazon offers this as a subscribe and save item, because it is much cheaper than buying it anywhere else, but I really wish they would let you sign up for more than one box a month.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023

reviews.reviewText: First time I ordered this item came with 3 packs of 18, so total 54 pieces. My 2nd order only came with one box of 18. Amazon was able to give me a refund for the item though.

Perfect and can't be found in regular stores! Still not enough for ladies with TOO HEAVY periods as I had so I asked doctor for the pill. But other than this, perfect product and if you buy bulk of it, you pay a very good price.
Sehr gut!Ich habe nur so viel. Denn diese Unannehmlichkeiten wird im Vergleich zu anderen Produkten. So Ich wurde wieder kaufen:)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 16, 2017
reviews.reviewText: Unbelievably secure - complete convert from well-known Pearl product. These are plus plus too which for some of us is a revelation

reviews.reviewTitle: Not a fan of the product
reviews.reviewText: They have a strange consistency and not as absorbable as some of their competitors. Didn’t realise they included the applicator, that was probably my fault.
